metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7458 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
linenoise, as used in Redis before 3.2.3, uses world-readable permissionsfor .rediscli_history, which allows local users to obtain sensitiveinformation by reading the file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7458` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redis-server - 2:2.8.4-2ubuntu0.2
redis-tools - 2:2.8.4-2ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: redis package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.8.4-2ubuntu0.2').
